summary: Dr. Shastine Abate was reprimanded and placed on one-year probation for unprofessional conduct, including failing to secure her medical office, improper disposal of expired medications, and terminating a patient relationship due to a complaint. Subsequently, she voluntarily surrendered her medical license, effective December 31, 2019, to avoid compliance with the probation terms, a surrender accepted by the Board on November 5, 2019.
